Hello World

Jun 16, 2013

 bla  bla

This github/jekyll hybrid is my third attempt to have a blog.

The first one was real fun, it was a blog, hosted on virtual server powered by Textpattern CMS. That was kind of interesting, I wrote few plugins, commited to existing ones, but once I started to understand how creepy PHP is, it started to become less and less fun to maintain that.

After that I got hooked up with blog-as-a-service Posterous, which was first acquired by Twitter, and then shut down on Feb 2013.

Now this. Letâ€™s see how it goes
